page.title: 13THE CONSERVATIVE CANDIDATE
page.content: The Conservative candidate is Robert James. He is fifty-four years old and has lived in Comberton for the past twenty-nine years. Mr James has been involved in politics for a long time. When we interviewed him he said that he liked his job but there were times when he disliked it. One of the jobs Mr. James is responsible for is not letting the village grow any bigger than it is.Also Mr. James was responsible for moving the motorway further away from a neighbouring village. Mr. James said he was going to improve schools, roads and libraries but Mr. James said this would not effect Meridian school because it's got room for two hundred or more pupils.
